author: Adrian Collins
description:
In K.J. Parker’s dark fantasy novella Making History, usurper king Gyges has gathered the finest minds in all of Aelia to rewrite history and cement his invented legacy. One of those fine minds is our protagonist, who, along with this fellow academics, has been press ganged into making history. He’s a bit of a genius […]

The post REVIEW: Making History by K. J. Parker appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Making History by K. J. Parker
